text: Awuboni yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi uyawahambisa amafu bese eyawaqoqaawanqwabelendawonyebeseubonaimvulaiphuma phakathi kuwona na? Futhi wehlisela phansi okuphuma esibhakabhakeni okuyizintaba (zamafu) okuphuma kuzona isichotho ashaya ngaso noma ngabe ngubani amthandayo futhi asiqhelelanise kunanoma ngabe ngubani amthandayo. Ukushaya kombani kucishe kuthathe ukubona
